name: Ar
description: Largest and most powerful city on Gor. 'Glorious Ar.' Imperial ambitions.

name: Ko-ro-ba
description: The Towers of the Morning. Tarl Cabot's adopted Home Stone. Noble and honorable city.

name: Turia
description: Ar of the South. Wealthy, powerful. Nearly destroyed by Wagon Peoples, rebuilt.

name: Port Kar
description: Pirate city. No Home Stone originally. Council of Captains governs. Built on marsh.

name: Tharna
description: Once matriarchal (women ruled, men veiled). Revolution restored traditional order.

name: Schendi
description: Equatorial port city. Mix of jungle tribes and city culture. Trade center.

name: Lydius
description: Northern trade city. Lumber important. Gateway to Torvaldsland.

name: Venna
description: Famed for tharlarion racing. Racing tharlarion breeding center.

name: Tor
description: Wealthy desert city. Principal supply point for Tahari oases. Luxurious and splendid.

name: Kassau
description: Northern edge of forests. Seat of High Initiate of the North. Sacked by Torvaldsland raiders.

name: Thentis
description: Mountain city in Thentis range. Black wine (coffee) production. Smuggling fought by sleen.

name: Treve
description: Outlaw city in Voltai Mountains. Raids other cities for slaves and wealth.

name: Tyros
description: Island city-state on Thassa. Rival of Cos. Naval power.

name: Cos
description: Island city-state on Thassa. Rival of Tyros. Naval power, physicians famed.

name: Dust Legs
description: Peaceful Red Savage tribe, traders

name: Kaiila (Cutthroat Tribe)
description: Five bands: Isbu, Casmu, Isanna, Napoktan, Wismahi

name: Yellow Knives
description: Red Savage tribe

name: Sleen
description: Red Savage tribe

name: Fleer
description: Red Savage tribe

name: Kinyanpi
description: Tarn masters! Unique among Red Savages

name: Tuchuks
description: Kamchak's tribe. One of four Wagon Peoples tribes

name: Kataii
description: One of four Wagon Peoples tribes

name: Kassars
description: One of four Wagon Peoples tribes

name: Paravaci
description: One of four Wagon Peoples tribes

name: Aretai
description: Led by Suleiman. Red-bordered burnoose, black kaffiyeh, white agal

name: Kavars
description: Led by Haroun. Enemy of Aretai. Blue scimitar tattoo

name: Tashid
description: Vassal of Aretai, nearly autonomous

name: Ushindi
description: Jungle tribe

name: Ukungu
description: Jungle tribe

name: Mamba
description: Jungle tribe

name: Sardar Mountains
description: Sacred mountains, home of Priest-Kings. Dark, ice-crowned peaks. Pilgrimage destination.
notes: Force shield prevents animals from entering. Most who climb never return.

name: Voltai Mountains
description: Mountain range. Home to larls, mountain tabuk, verr. Treve (outlaw city) located here.

name: Thentis Mountain Region
description: Mountain range with city of Thentis. Black wine production.

name: Hrimgar Mountains
description: Barrier mountains between Torvaldsland and polar basin. Pass of Tancred.
notes: Arctic gants nest on bird cliffs.

name: Vosk Delta
description: Massive marsh delta where Vosk River enters Thassa. Rencer territory. Port Kar built here.

name: Vosk River
description: Major river. Trade route. Freezes in winter, thaws in spring. Northern hemisphere.
notes: Vosk gulls migrate when ice breaks.

name: Cartius River
description: Major river in equatorial regions. Jungle tarns from here.

name: Tahari Desert / The Wastes
description: Vast desert southeast of Ar. Hundreds/thousands of pasangs wide. Oases scattered. Salt mining.
notes: Dune country, salt pits of Klima, Sand kaiila. Survival requires water conservation.

name: The Barrens
description: Vast grasslands, home of Red Savages and kailiauk herds (millions). Prairie.

name: The Plains
description: Vast grasslands where Wagon Peoples migrate with bosk herds.

name: Northern Forests
description: Forests south of Torvaldsland. Panther Girl territory. Kassau at northern edge.

name: Great Forests
description: Extensive forests in various regions. Home to many predators.
notes: Great banded horned hith (python) lives here.

name: Rainforests / Jungles
description: Equatorial jungles near Schendi. Talunas, jungle tribes, incredible biodiversity.
notes: Ants, anteaters, jungle gants, mambas, rock spiders, many tabuk varieties.

name: Polar Basin
description: Frozen tundra north of Hrimgar Mountains. Red Hunter territory. Midnight sun/polar night.
notes: Tabuk migrations, sea sleen, whales. Ice beasts (Kurii). Extreme cold.

name: Torvaldsland
description: Northern lands of Viking-inspired culture. Harsh, rocky, ice-crowned mountains. Limited arable land.
notes: Stream of Torvald current warms region. Torvaldsberg mountain (legendary).

name: Thassa (The Sea)
description: The vast ocean. Islands of Cos, Tyros, others. Naval warfare, shipping, fishing.
notes: Parsit fish, sea sleen, sharks, whales. Sometimes frozen in polar regions.

name: Oasis of the Battle of Red Rock
description: Aretai outpost with kasbah. Named for 10051 C.A. battle.

name: Oasis of Nine Wells
description: Major oasis held by Suleiman of Aretai

name: Oasis of Four Palms
description: Kavar outpost

name: Oasis of Sand Sleen
description: Kavar oasis

name: Brine Pits of Klima
description: Secret salt mining location. Thousands of male slaves. Escape nearly impossible. Hidden in dune country.
notes: No women permitted. Brutal conditions. Salt sharks, lelts.

name: Torvaldsberg
description: Sacred mountain where legendary Torvald allegedly sleeps. 17,000+ feet high. Bent spear blade shape.
notes: Cave at peak contains ancient weapons and armor.

name: The Nest
description: Priest-Kings' underground complex beneath Sardar Mountains. Tunnels, chambers, fungus farms.
notes: Golden Beetles live in unlit caverns. Muls (workers). Destroyed/rebuilt in Nest War.

name: Ax Glacier
description: Northern border of Torvaldsland. Red Hunters live here at valley entrance.
